initialDisplay.title: Initial Outline Display
initialDisplay.description: Show outline initially aftern atom loads

sortEntries.title: Sort entries based on the line number
sortEntries.description: This option sorts the entries based on where they appear in the code.

foldInitially.title: Fold the entries initially
foldInitially.description: If enabled, the outline entries are folded initially. This is enabled automatically in large file mode.
